name: Yet Another Dotfiles Manager (yadm)
description: Install yadm (Yet Another Dotfiles Manager) for managing dotfiles in a git repository

repositoryUrl.description: Git repository URL to clone with yadm. If provided, 'yadm clone <url>' will be executed after installation.

localClass.description: Yadm config local.class value. If provided, 'yadm config local.class <localClass>' will be executed after clone.

overwriteExisting.description: If true, existing files will be overwritten when cloning the dotfiles repository using 'yadm checkout $HOME'.
